code:
import axios from"axios";// 创建并封装axios
var service=axios.create({timeout:60000});// 请求拦截器
service.interceptors.request.use(function(config){if(config.method==='post'){var token=window.localStorage.token;token&&(config.headers.token=token);}return config;});// 响应拦截器
service.interceptors.response.use(function(response){return response===null||response===void 0?void 0:response.data;});export default service;
